StringProperty.Name: OutputDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Explicitly specifies the output directory for the generated files.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputLocation
EnumProperty.Description: Explicitly specifies the output location for the hidden and non-editable generated files.

EnumValue.Name: IntermediateDirectory
EnumValue.Description: Files are generated into the intermediate output directory, i.e. the project's "obj" directory.

EnumValue.Name: CurrentDirectory
EnumValue.Description: Files are generated next to the original file.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: {}{ItemType}
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: How the file relates to the build and deployment processes.

EnumProperty.Name: CopyToOutputDirectory
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the source file will be copied to the output directory.

StringProperty.Name: Generator
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the tool that transforms a file at design time and places the output of that transformation into another file. For example, a dataset (.xsd) file comes with a default custom tool.

StringProperty.Name: CustomToolNamespace
StringProperty.Description: The namespace into which the output of the custom tool is placed.

StringProperty.Name: Identity
StringProperty.Description: The item specified in the Include attribute.

StringProperty.Name: FileNameAndExtension
StringProperty.Description: Name of the file or folder.

StringProperty.Name: LastGenOutput
StringProperty.Description: The filename of the last file generated as a result of the SFG.

BoolProperty.Name: DesignTime
BoolProperty.Description: A value indicating whether this file has a designer.

BoolProperty.Name: AutoGen
BoolProperty.Description: A value indicating whether this is a generated file.

StringProperty.Name: CustomTool
StringProperty.Description: DTE Property for accessing the Generator property.
